generatedTitle: One Punch Man: A Popular Japanese Anime with Unique Storyline and Engaging Characters

extractFactDictList.question: What is One Punch Man?
extractFactDictList.sentence: One Punch Man is a popular Japanese anime television series based on the manga series of the same name.

extractFactDictList.question: When was the first season of One Punch Man released?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The first season of the anime was released in 2015 and was a huge success among anime fans.

extractFactDictList.question: How many episodes are in the first season of One Punch Man?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The first season of One Punch Man consists of 12 episodes, each with a running time of approximately 24 minutes.

extractFactDictList.question: Who directed the first season of One Punch Man?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The series was directed by Shingo Natsume and written by Tomohiro Suzuki.

extractFactDictList.question: What is the storyline of the first season of One Punch Man?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The first season of One Punch Man follows the story of Saitama, a superhero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch.
